About me

In this section, I'll tell you about my soft skills. Here objectively rating from me, my family and friends (including those with whom I worked).

I good find contact with different people. I like to chat and I love to share the new information.

I take the initiative in everything. I believe that the initiative is the best manifestation of human productivity.

I love to learn something new, it is a lifestyle. Every day I learn, starting with English and ending programming.

I can solve the problems myself(which can be solved independently). But sometimes without the aid can not do.

Ambitious I have plenty. Exactly ambition make you the person that you can become.

The responsibility for me a very important thing, because it can be judged by how much you are decent. If I take the responsibility, I do what I can

Also in this chart you can learn about my other soft skills. They have also drawn up by of objective evaluation of my family, friends and acquaintances (including with whom I worked).

English. My level of English - Intermediate. In 2015, I studied at Capital English and received a certificate of successful completion of the A2 level. I also learn English at web services as: Duolingo, Busuu, Puzzle-English.
